[Home](./index.md) &gt; [nifty-tou](./nifty-tou.md) &gt; [NumberFormatter](./nifty-tou.numberformatter.md) &gt; [format](./nifty-tou.numberformatter.format.md)

## NumberFormatter.format() method

Format a number into a string.

This will return `"NaN"` if `n` is `NaN` or an empty string if `n` is `undefined` or `null`<!-- -->. Otherwise, `n` will be formatted with `format` if provided, falling back to a format with [DEFAULT\_FORMAT\_OPTIONS](./nifty-tou.default_format_options.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
format(n: number, format?: Intl.NumberFormat): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | number | the number to format |
|  format | Intl.NumberFormat | _(Optional)_ the format to use, or else a default format will be used |

**Returns:**

string

the formatted number
